plot outline: Raj (Gurunandan) is a wealthy man, an ideal student, a doting son who has everything one could ever want. He has the perfect life yet all this perfection is superficial. He longs for something. Will the new boy in campus (Snehith Gowda) be able to help him find solace? Will Raj be able to rekindle his romance with his high school sweetheart Prarthana (Sharanya)? Will Rajs life be complete?
title: Chiravada Nenapu
plot: Raj (Gurunandan) is a wealthy man, an ideal student, a doting son who has everything one could ever want. He has the perfect life yet all this perfection is superficial. He longs for something. Will the new boy in campus (Snehith Gowda) be able to help him find solace? Will Raj be able to rekindle his romance with his high school sweetheart Prarthana (Sharanya)? Will Rajs life be complete?

A college student who is handsome, wealthy, intelligent and well-loved finds himself feeling lost, lonely and strangely disconnected from the world. Will a new friend succeed in helping him rekindle his romance? Will he find completion in life?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
